info.official_title: The Efficacy and Safety of The Fuzuloparib Combination With Bevacizumab in Maintenance Treatment for Platinum-Sensitive Recurrent Ovarian Cancer

identified_line.line: 1. Patients with platinum-sensitive recurrent ovarian cancer confirmed by pathology or histology;
2. Patients who have previously received platinum-based chemotherapy and had a recurrence interval of > 6 months before the last platinum-based chemotherapy;

criterions.exact_snippets: recurrence interval of > 6 months before the last platinum-based chemotherapy

and_criteria.exact_snippets: recurrence interval of > 6 months before the last platinum-based chemotherapy

identified_line.line: 3. Patients who have previously received bevacizumab and did not experience progression within 3 months during the use of bevacizumab;

criterions.exact_snippets: Patients who have previously received bevacizumab
did not experience progression within 3 months during the use of bevacizumab
did not experience progression within 3 months during the use of bevacizumab

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Patients who have previously received bevacizumab
did not experience progression within 3 months during the use of bevacizumab
did not experience progression within 3 months during the use of bevacizumab

identified_line.line: 4. Patients who have previously received PARP inhibitors and did not experience progression within 12 months during the use of PARP inhibitors;

criterions.exact_snippets: Patients who have previously received PARP inhibitors
did not experience progression within 12 months during the use of PARP inhibitors

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Patients who have previously received PARP inhibitors
did not experience progression within 12 months during the use of PARP inhibitors

identified_line.line: 5. The patient achieved a complete or partial response after the last platinum-based chemotherapy;

criterions.exact_snippets: The patient achieved a complete or partial response after the last platinum-based chemotherapy

and_criteria.exact_snippets: The patient achieved a complete or partial response after the last platinum-based chemotherapy

identified_line.line: 6. Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0-1;

criterions.exact_snippets: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0-1

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0-1

identified_line.line: 7. The patient has a life expectancy of at least 3 months and sufficient organ function;

criterions.exact_snippets: life expectancy of at least 3 months

and_criteria.exact_snippets: life expectancy of at least 3 months

identified_line.line: 8. The patient has sufficient bone marrow reserves and organ function, including a creatinine clearance rate of 45 mL/min calculated using the standard Cockcroft and Gault formula;
9. The patient voluntarily agrees to participate in this study and signs an informed consent form.

criterions.exact_snippets: The patient voluntarily agrees to participate in this study

and_criteria.exact_snippets: The patient voluntarily agrees to participate in this study

identified_line.line: Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
1. Patients who are known to be allergic or intolerant to chemotherapy drugs or their excipients and cannot swallow medication;

criterions.exact_snippets: Patients who are known to be allergic or intolerant to chemotherapy drugs
criterions.criterion: allergy or intolerance to chemotherapy drugs

criterions.exact_snippets: Patients who are known to be allergic or intolerant to ... excipients

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Patients who are known to be allergic or intolerant to chemotherapy drugs
and_criteria.criterion: allergy or intolerance to chemotherapy drugs

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Patients who are known to be allergic or intolerant to ... excipients

identified_line.line: 2. Patients who have undergone major surgery within 28 days prior to enrollment;

criterions.exact_snippets: undergone major surgery within 28 days prior to enrollment

and_criteria.exact_snippets: undergone major surgery within 28 days prior to enrollment

identified_line.line: 3. Patients with central nervous system metastases or a history of seizures within the past 12 months;

criterions.exact_snippets: history of seizures within the past 12 months

or_criteria.exact_snippets: history of seizures within the past 12 months

identified_line.line: 6. Patients with severe, uncontrolled systemic diseases;
7. Patients who have received any other investigational drug treatment or participated in any other clinical trials within 30 days prior to enrollment in this study;

criterions.exact_snippets: Patients who have received any other investigational drug treatment
participated in any other clinical trials within 30 days prior to enrollment

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Patients who have received any other investigational drug treatment
participated in any other clinical trials within 30 days prior to enrollment

identified_line.line: 8. Pregnant or lactating patients, or patients who cannot guarantee effective contraception during the study treatment period;

criterions.exact_snippets: patients who cannot guarantee effective contraception

or_criteria.exact_snippets: patients who cannot guarantee effective contraception

identified_line.line: 9. Patients with poorly controlled neurological or psychiatric disorders or mental illness, poor compliance, and inability to cooperate or describe treatment response;

criterions.exact_snippets: poorly controlled neurological or psychiatric disorders or mental illness
criterions.criterion: neurological or psychiatric disorders or mental illness

and_criteria.exact_snippets: poorly controlled neurological or psychiatric disorders or mental illness
and_criteria.criterion: neurological or psychiatric disorders or mental illness

identified_line.line: 10. Patients judged by the investigator to be unsuitable for participation in this study.

criterions.exact_snippets: Patients judged by the investigator to be unsuitable for participation

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Patients judged by the investigator to be unsuitable for participation

identified_line.line: 4. Uncontrolled hypertension: systolic blood pressure ≥180mmHg, diastolic blood pressure ≥90mmHg;
5. NYHA functional class ≥ III;
